product.name: Maybelline Dream Bouncy Blush
product.description:
Now, blush has bounce! Freshest flush ever:• New bouncy texture is formulated with silicone elastomers• Lightweight like a powder, yet melts seamlessly into skin like a cream giving you a fresh flush• Dermatologist tested• Allergy tested• Non-comedogenic
                    
                    
                    
                        
                        For best results: With your fingertips, blend a small amount of
 blush onto the apples of your cheeks, applying from your cheekbones to 
your temples. To build colour intensity, apply more blush.
